page.title: 11SANDY LEAS FARM;LONGNEWTON
page.content: OUR FARM IS NEAR LONGNEWTON.WE GROW {WHEAT,BARLEY,OIL SEED RAPE}AND {POTATOES.}IN AUGUST THESE CROPS ARE HARVESTED WITH A{COMBINE HARVESTER.}WE SELL THE GRAIN TO DIFFERENT COMPANIES. MOST OF THE GRAIN GOES ABROAD TO BE MADE INTO FOOD.WE PICK OUR POTATOES BY HAND AND THEY ARE PICKED IN{OCTOBER. ON OUR FARM WE ALSO HAVE ANIMALS.WE KEEP{PIGS,CALVES}AND{A PONY.}WE HAVE ABOUT{300}PIGS AND{6}CALVES TO FATTEN UP AND SELL.WE SELL OUR LIVESTOCK AT THE MART,MAINLY STOCKTON AND DARLINGTON. WE HAVE{2 DOGS}AND{2 CATS.}THEY ARE WORKING ANIMALS BUT THE DOGS ARE ALSO PETS. THE{MACHINERY}WE USE CONSISTS OF A COMBINE,TRACTORS,DRILLS,POTATO PLANTERS,ROTAVATORS,CHEMICAL SPREADERS AND SPRAYERS.OUR FARM IS{250 ACRES.
